mbean.name: java.util.logging:type=Logging
mbean.description: The management interface for the logging facility.

attribute.name: LoggerNames
attribute.description: Returns the list of currently registered loggers.

operation.name: getParentLoggerName
operation.description: Returns the name of the parent for the specified logger. If the specified logger does not exist, null is returned. If the specified logger is the root Logger in the namespace, the result will be an empty string.

operation.name: getLoggerLevel
operation.description: Gets the name of the log level associated with the specified logger. If the specified logger does not exist, null is returned. If the Level of the specified logger is null, which means that this logger's effective level is inherited from its parent, an empty string will be returned.

parameter.name: loggerName
parameter.description: The name of the Logger to be retrieved.

operation.name: setLoggerLevel
operation.description: Sets the specified logger to the specified new level. If the levelName is not null, the level of the specified logger is set to the parsed Level matching the levelName. If the levelName is null, the level of the specified logger is set to null and the effective level of the logger is inherited from its nearest ancestor with a specific (non-null) level value.

parameter.name: loggerName
parameter.description: The name of the Logger to be set.

parameter.name: levelName
parameter.description: The name of the level to set the specified logger to, or null if to set the level to inherit from its nearest ancestor.
